articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk beats Tyson Fury on points in Saudi Arabia to become the undisputed heavyweight champion of the world.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk: Ukrainian becomes undisputed heavyweight champion

articles.description: Shane Lowry shoots a major record-equalling 62 to move two shots behind joint leaders Collin Morikawa and Xander Schauffele in round three of the US PGA Championship in Kentucky.
articles.title: Lowry & Rose move firmly into contention at US PGA

articles.description: As well as the title race, there are other things to be decided on the final day of the Premier League season.
articles.title: Premier League final-day: Title race, European qualification and Klopp's farewell

articles.description: Tyson Fury was wrong to assume he was ahead on the scorecards during his heavyweight title defeat by Oleksandr Usyk, says former undisputed champion Lennox Lewis.
articles.title: Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk: Lennox Lewis criticises Fury tactics

articles.description: Brighton confirm that head coach Roberto de Zerbi will leave the club after their final Premier League match of the season at home to Manchester United on Sunday.
articles.title: Brighton: Boss Roberto de Zerbi to leave after final game

articles.description: Max Verstappen says it was “very special” to equal Ayrton Senna’s all-time record of eight consecutive pole positions at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
articles.title: Imola GP 2024: Max Verstappen says it is 'very special' to equal Ayrton Senna's poles record

articles.description: Iga Swiatek beats Aryna Sabalenka in straight sets to win the Italian Open for the third time in four years.
articles.title: Iga Swiatek dominates Aryna Sabalenka to win Italian Open

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Bayer Leverkusen vs Augsburg in the Bundesliga
articles.title: Bayer Leverkusen vs Augsburg: Bundesliga - BBC Sport

articles.description: Emma Hayes is used to winning the Women's Super League with Chelsea - but nobody could have written this script better.
articles.title: Emma Hayes: Perfect Chelsea goodbye for manager with another WSL title

articles.description: Trophy days at Celtic Park are usually quite the occasion, but Saturday’s went above and beyond.
articles.title: Celtic trophy day: Joe Hart, Santa & five goals - how it all unfolded
